title: 2BD - Spacious Garden Unit
posting_body: Park Shores is a quintessential courtyard walk-up in Chicago’s historic family friendly Buena Park Neighborhood, home to the most beautiful lakeside mansions and Georgian architecture.
This large garden unit features full size appliances, central heating, a dishwasher and hardwood flooring.
This unit (#4306-0A) is now on special for only $1,550 per month!
Visit our website for more information and to view live availability: parkshores.groupfox.com
Disclaimer: Pricing, availability, lease terms and specials are subject to change.
Apartment availability and lease terms may vary.
Please note that the price may be net effective of a special and/or concessions that are currently running.
Pictures may be of similar unit with similar finishes.
Information is believed to be accurate, however, is subject to errors and omissions.
